system.description:
The Harbingers are the keepers of prophecy and magic, and their soul is unlike any other. You have a sixth stat, Doom, and an additional +0 to assign between your stats. When your Doom stat gets damaged by an enemy attack, you must damage another one of your stats.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} by relying on fate or luck, roll +Doom.

When you Share this Move with another, their Doom stat is +1.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You lose the advantage, and must face retaliation.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: You deal damage to them and lose your advantage over them. If an ally was @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keeping Them Busy}, they aren't anymore.

success.label: Success!
success.value: On a 10+, their fate is sealed. The Overlord player decides what happens to them.
